participants.name: Mark Campbell
participants.title: Technical Recruiter at IMPACT Technology Recruiting

messages.message:
DevOps Opportunities / Phoenix, AZ

Brian, 

I hope this message finds you doing well. I am actively seeking to fill multiple DevOps roles in the Phoenix area. These positions are direct hire opportunities that offer an extremely strong compensation package, to include a sign-on bonus. 

If you would be interested in discussing, please give me a call at 480.307.9002 at your earliest convenience. In the event you are not currently in the market, please pass on my contact information as I can offer a $1k referral bonus should anyone you recommend be placed via IMPACT.

Thanks for your consideration and I look forward to hearing from you!

Mark Campbell
Technical Recruiter at IMPACT Technology Recruiting
602.300.0384
You don't have a profile picture so I don't know if you are real.

Hi Brian, thanks for your response. I apologize, but yes, I am real. I work out of our Scottsdale office located on the 101 and Scottsdale Road. I have several positions available to include many opportunities at Choice Hotels, Pegasus and Prizelogic. Let me know if you have a couple of minutes to chat and we can narrow down roles that best fit your financial parameters. Thanks again!
I make 95 but I have an expensive European wife. Not really sure how to be more productive. Programming is really time consuming.
Sounds like we may need to try and get you a raise. I do have some contract opportunities that pay $60 per hour, would you consider that if it was the right opportunity?
No, contract suck. They treat contractors like they aren't a part of the team, and exclude them from important decisions.

Totally understand. Would you like to explore the DevOps direct hires at Choice, they pay around $105k - $120k depending on experience and I can throw in a sign-on bonus. Looking for someone who has some AWS experience, development background is a positive.
Can I work for two companies like Evan Spiegel?
I think Evan has things figured out.
